review: I would like this device a whole lot more if it didn't continuously get hung up when streaming even when utilizing the extender that Amazon provides. I just ordered a wifi extender and am hoping that might cure the problem but I can tell you that I don't have a similar issue when using Apple TV.  A disappointment, for sure.
author: KD

review: I like it for the tv's that are not connected to a device that gets Netflix or many devices that do get Netflix, do not support Amazon Prime.  It's also always on, so you don't have to wait for your device to "warm up" and connect, ....just change the input to your tv, and bam,...it's on and ready to go.
author: SarcasticShopper

review: Works great for what I use it for, mostly Netflix and Amazon Prime. I bought it instead of getting another blu ray player for my second TV. I don't regret it. Doesn't have all the same TV apps as the Kindle Fire, though.
